abilities.description:
When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.c8bacc17f73d3103]{Face Danger} edge by pushing your foe or foes back with wide ares of the urumi, choose your approach (decide before rolling).

  • Lashing cobra: On a strong hit, inflict 1 harm.
  • Grinning tiger: On a hit, take +1 momentum.
  • Mauling bear: On a hit, @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.5288e935906f6d28]{Strike} (if you have initiative) or @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.7e008d0f656dc8b3]{Clash} now and add +1.
As above, but when you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.c8bacc17f73d3103]{Face Danger} in this way, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.

You may choose to add +1 when you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.5288e935906f6d28]{Strike} or @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.7e008d0f656dc8b3]{Clash}. If you do, inflict 1 harm (instead of 2).
